title: Mercury in Sagittarius
summary: Thinking stretches toward big ideas, principles, and possibilities. Curiosity roams wide and prefers meaning over minutiae. The opportunity is to explore boldly while staying tethered to facts.

meaning.headline: Mind seeks broad horizons and honest debate.

frames.text: Mercury in Sagittarius favors big-picture thinking, storytelling, and candid opinions.
Ideas spread quickly, and enthusiasm grows when they align with a sense of purpose.
Humor and blunt honesty may show up more readily.
Learning through travel, philosophy, or cross-cultural exchange is highlighted.
Being outspoken proves you are right or grants a free pass on accuracy.

opportunities: Studying a topic that expands perspective
Reframing problems with a bigger lens

do: Check facts before amplifying an idea.
Translate big concepts into next steps.
Invite debate and be willing to adjust.
Use stories to connect people to purpose.
Notice when humor needs a softer edge.
avoid: Dismissive jokes that land as insults
Ignoring constraints that make ideas workable

reusable_lines.text: Think big and stay honest about the details.
Curiosity travels farther when accuracy rides along.

forbidden_claims: Predictions of success for grand plans
Guarantees that bold statements will persuade
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can widen perspective and spark exploration
Agency-forward language: you choose which paths to follow
Contextual framing: optimism helps when grounded

sources: Mercury as mind/communication archetype in daily cycles
